# 1915 Swarthmore Quakers football team

The 1915 Swarthmore Quakers football team was an American football team that represented Swarthmore College as an independent during the 1915 college football season. In their first season under head coach Bill Roper, the Quakers compiled a 5â€“3 record and outscored opponents by a total of 94 to 77.
